**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 246 1.1 Namers have hidden their special techniques, spells, and items for millennia. **Feats**: [Reveal True Name](/Feats.aspx?ID=3028)

**Items**: [_True name amulet_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1083)
